title: AI Practical Competency Enhancement: Learning Analytics-Based Personalized Feedback Design for Large-Scale Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in social fields and basic data analysis proficiency
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Feedback strategies tailored to learner group characteristics can be designed using learning analytics data.
In large-scale lecture environments, feedback topics can be prioritized by linking them to learner performance outcomes.
Customized feedback messages can be generated based on individual learner performance metrics during project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
